text: I've received many reports from our customers asking why their timelines now have one event for each message on their conversation. I'm directing them to open a case with HubSpot and ask for: 1) a reason to why we can't edit a timeline event and 2) what are the alternatives HubSpot suggests. Hopefully with a spike in customers asking for it the decision will be reviewed.
Hi Mailson, if you'd like you can direct them to me - <mailto:losterberg@HubSpot.com|losterberg@HubSpot.com>
